tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Data (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE IoT_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Energy_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Demand_response (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    response_type TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE demand_response (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  response_type VARCHAR(50),
  response_value BOOLEAN
);
